abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Albertinia DC.", "TaxonKey is Albertinia Spreng.", "TaxonKey is Anteremanthus H.Rob.", "TaxonKey is Blanchetia DC.", "TaxonKey is Centratherum Cass.", "TaxonKey is Chresta Vell., 1831", "TaxonKey is Chresta Vell. ex DC.", "TaxonKey is Elephantopus L.", "TaxonKey is Eremanthus Less.", "TaxonKey is Gorceixia Baker", "TaxonKey is Haplostephium Mart. ex DC., 1836", "TaxonKey is Heterocoma DC.", "TaxonKey is Hololepis DC.", "TaxonKey is Lychnocephalus Mart. ex DC., 1836", "TaxonKey is Lychnophora Mart.", "TaxonKey is Lychnophoriopsis Sch.Bip.", "TaxonKey is Maschalostachys Loeuille & Roque", "TaxonKey is Minasia H.Rob.", "TaxonKey is Paralychnophora N.F.F.MacLeish", "TaxonKey is Piptolepis Sch.Bip.", "TaxonKey is Pithecoseris Mart. ex DC.", "TaxonKey is Proteopsis Mart. & Zucc. ex Sch.Bip., 1863", "TaxonKey is Proteopsis Mart. & Zucc. ex DC.", "TaxonKey is Rolandra Rottb.", "TaxonKey is Soaresia Sch.Bip.", "TaxonKey is Spiracantha Kunth", "TaxonKey is Telmatophila Mart. ex Baker", "TaxonKey is Vanillosmopsis Sch.Bip., 1863", "TaxonKey is Vinicia Dematt." ] } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Universidad de Oviedo. Departamento de Biología de Organismos y Sistemas: FCO 1 records from Herbarium of Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Extremadura (Spain) 1 records from Institut Botanic de Barcelona (IBB-CSIC-ICUB), BC-Plantae 1 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 1 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from Universidad de Oviedo.
